game.shortDescription: Dark Souls 시리즈를 개발한 FromSoftware의 새로운 어드벤처에서 복수를 향한 자신만의 길을 개척해보십시오. 복수하십시오. 명예를 회복하십시오. 무사답게 싸우십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Game of the Year - The Game Awards 2019 Best Action Game of 2019 - IGN Carve your own clever path to vengeance in the award winning adventure from developer FromSoftware, creators of Bloodborne and the Dark Souls series. Take Revenge. Restore Your Honor. Kill Ingeniously.
game.publishers: Activision (Excluding Japan and Asia), FromSoftware, Inc. (Japan), 方块游戏 (Asia)
